SELECT s.id, s.uid, s.seller_name, s.identity, s.category_id, s.sale_price, ( SELECT SUM(( security_rating + environment_rating + service_rating + price_rating ) / 4 ) / COUNT(*) FROM service_evaluation se WHERE se.service_id = s.id ) AS stars, s.service_name, ( SELECT si.service_image FROM service_images si WHERE si.service_id = s.id AND is_list_image = 1 LIMIT 1 ) AS list_image, s.tags, s.view_count, s.sale_count FROM service s WHERE s.del_flag = 0 AND s.status = 1
AND s.category_id = #{categoryId}
ORDER BY s.create_time DESC
ORDER BY s.sale_count DESC
ORDER BY s.sale_price ASC
ORDER BY s.sale_price DESC
LIMIT #{start}, #{pageSize}

SELECT s.id AS sid, s.uid, s.seller_name, s.identity, s.category_id, s.sale_price, (SELECT SUM((security_rating + environment_rating + service_rating + price_rating) / 4) / COUNT(*) FROM service_evaluation se WHERE se.service_id = s.id) AS stars, s.service_name, s.tags, s.view_count, s.sale_count, m.opening_time, m.closing_time, m.address FROM service s LEFT JOIN member m ON m.id = s.uid WHERE s.del_flag = 0 AND s.status = 1 AND s.id = #{serviceId}
